vista.gui
Interface Changeable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AxisDialogPanel, CurveDialogPanel, DataSetAttrEditor, DefaultCurveDialogPanel, FlagChoiceFrame, GEDialog, GEDialogPanel, GETreeDialog, OpenConnectionDialog, OptionsDialog, PathnameEditor, ProfileAnimationDialog, ReorderMergingCurvesDialog, SortDialog, SymbolDialogPanel, TextDialogPanel
public interface Changeable

Informs an object that implements this interface that OK, Cancel or Apply button is pressed. The object registers itself in the ButtonPanel either in the constructor or by adding itself to the list of Changeables.

See Also:
ButtonPanel

Method Summary
 void applyChanges()
          Apply the changes (OK/Apply button pressed)
 void doneChanges()
          Done with making changes (OK/Cancel button pressed)
 

Method Detail

void doneChanges()
Done with making changes (OK/Cancel button pressed)
